name: Fair Standards Alliance
goal: Our mission is to promote licensing practices of standards-essential patents that are Fair, Reasonable and Non-Discriminatory, as described in the key principles of the Alliance.
interests: Competition, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: All policies and initiatives related to standards and patents, including follow-up initiatives from the public consultation on patents and standards and any upcoming review of the IPR Enforcement Directive
